timeline.body:
I don’t think this statement is right anymore at least on recent versions from reading the docs,

My understanding is that it is available but there’s a global flag for turning it off or on.

Having it off means that it will return a 404
timeline.bodyText:

timeline.bodyHTML:
I don’t think this statement is right anymore at least on recent versions from reading the docs,

My understanding is that it is available but there’s a global flag for turning it off or on.

Having it off means that it will return a 404
timeline.author: timja

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
// GitHub Enterprise doesn't have the rate_limit endpoint
// For some versions of GitHub Enterprise, the rate_limit endpoint returns a 404.
timeline.author: bitwiseman
